verses.verse: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> And David הֲכִ֣י <WH3588> for יֶשׁ־ <WH3426> Is there yet ע֔וֹד <WH5750> yet אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> anyone נוֹתַ֖ר <WH3498> any that is left לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> of the house שָׁא֑וּל <WH7586> of Saul וְאֶעֱשֶׂ֤ה <WH6213> that I may shew עִמּוֹ֙ <WH5973> with חֶ֔סֶד <WH2617> him kindness בַּעֲב֖וּר <WH5668> for יְהוֹנָתָֽן׃ <WH3083> for Jonathan's

וּלְבֵ֨ית <WH1004> And [there was] of the house שָׁא֥וּל <WH7586> of Saul עֶ֙בֶד֙ <WH5650> a servant וּשְׁמ֣וֹ <WH8034> whose name צִיבָ֔א <WH6717> [was] Ziba וַיִּקְרְאוּ־ <WH7121> And when they had called ל֖וֹ אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִ֑ד <WH1732> him unto David וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said הַמֶּ֧לֶךְ <WH4428> the king אֵלָ֛יו <WH413> about הַאַתָּ֥ה <WH859> you צִיבָ֖א <WH6717> was Ziba וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said עַבְדֶּֽךָ׃ <WH5650> Thy servant

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king הַאֶ֨פֶס <WH657> [Is] there not ע֥וֹד <WH5750> yet אִישׁ֙ <WH376> yet any לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> of the house שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> of Saul וְאֶעֱשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> that I may shew עִמּ֖וֹ <WH5973> with חֶ֣סֶד <WH2617> the kindness אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> of God וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said צִיבָא֙ <WH6717> unto him? And Ziba אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> unto the king ע֛וֹד <WH5750> is still בֵּ֥ן <WH1121> hath yet a son לִיהוֹנָתָ֖ן <WH3083> Jonathan נְכֵ֥ה <WH5223> [which is] lame רַגְלָֽיִם׃ <WH7272> on [his] feet

וַיֹּֽאמֶר־ <WH559> said ל֥וֹ הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king אֵיפֹ֣ה <WH375> unto him Where ה֑וּא <WH1931> he וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said צִיבָא֙ <WH6717> [is] he? And Ziba אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> unto the king הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> Behold ה֗וּא <WH1931> he בֵּ֛ית <WH1004> Behold he [is] in the house מָכִ֥יר <WH4353> of Machir בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עַמִּיאֵ֖ל <WH5988> of Ammiel בְּל֥וֹ דְבָֽר׃ <WH3810> in Lodebar

וַיִּשְׁלַ֖ח <WH7971> sent הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Then king דָּוִ֑ד <WH1732> David וַיִּקָּחֵ֗הוּ <WH3947> and fetched מִבֵּ֛ית <WH1004> him out of the house מָכִ֥יר <WH4353> of Machir בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עַמִּיאֵ֖ל <WH5988> of Ammiel מִלּ֥וֹ דְבָֽר׃ <WH3810> from Lodebar

וַ֠יָּבֹא <WH935> was come מְפִיבֹ֨שֶׁת <WH4648> Now when Mephibosheth בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יְהוֹנָתָ֤ן <WH3083> of Jonathan בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שָׁאוּל֙ <WH7586> of Saul אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> unto David וַיִּפֹּ֥ל <WH5307> he fell עַל־ <WH5921> on פָּנָ֖יו <WH6440> on his face וַיִּשְׁתָּ֑חוּ <WH7812> and did reverence וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> And David מְפִיבֹ֔שֶׁת <WH4648> Mephibosheth וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> And he answered הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> Here עַבְדֶּֽךָ׃ <WH5650> Behold thy servant

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> said ל֨וֹ דָוִ֜ד <WH1732> And David אַל־ <WH408> not תִּירָ֗א <WH3372> unto him Fear כִּ֣י <WH3588> for עָשֹׂה֩ <WH6213> not for I will surely אֶעֱשֶׂ֨ה <WH6213> shew עִמְּךָ֥ <WH5973> with חֶ֙סֶד֙ <WH2617> thee kindness בַּֽעֲבוּר֙ <WH5668> the sake יְהוֹנָתָ֣ן <WH3083> for Jonathan אָבִ֔יךָ <WH1> thy father's וַהֲשִׁבֹתִ֣י <WH7725> sake and will restore לְךָ֔ אֶֽת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all שְׂדֵ֖ה <WH7704> thee all the land שָׁא֣וּל <WH7586> of Saul אָבִ֑יךָ <WH1> thy father וְאַתָּ֗ה <WH859> and you תֹּ֥אכַל <WH398> and thou shalt eat לֶ֛חֶם <WH3899> bread עַל־ <WH5921> at שֻׁלְחָנִ֖י <WH7979> at my table תָּמִֽיד׃ <WH8548> continually

וַיִּשְׁתַּ֕חוּ <WH7812> And he bowed וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> himself and said מֶ֣ה <WH4100> What עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH5650> What [is] thy servant כִּ֣י <WH3588> for פָנִ֔יתָ <WH6437> that thou shouldest look אֶל־ <WH413> about הַכֶּ֥לֶב <WH3611> dog הַמֵּ֖ת <WH4191> upon such a dead אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after כָּמֽוֹנִי׃ <WH3644> like

וַיִּקְרָ֣א <WH7121> called הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <WH4428> Then the king אֶל־ <WH413> about צִיבָ֛א <WH6717> to Ziba נַ֥עַר <WH5288> servant שָׁא֖וּל <WH7586> Saul's וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said אֵלָ֑יו <WH413> to him כֹּל֩ <WH3605> All אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> that הָיָ֤ה <WH1961> all that pertained לְשָׁאוּל֙ <WH7586> to Saul וּלְכָל־ <WH3605> all בֵּית֔וֹ <WH1004> and to all his house נָתַ֖תִּי <WH5414> unto him I have given לְבֶן־ <WH1121> son אֲדֹנֶֽיךָ׃ <WH113> unto thy master's

וְעָבַ֣דְתָּ <WH5647> shall till לּ֣וֹ אֶֽת־ <WH853> הָאֲדָמָ֡ה <WH127> the land אַתָּה֩ <WH859> You וּבָנֶ֨יךָ <WH1121> Thou therefore and thy sons וַעֲבָדֶ֜יךָ <WH5650> and thy servants וְהֵבֵ֗אתָ <WH935> for him and thou shalt bring וְהָיָ֨ה <WH1961> may have לְבֶן־ <WH1121> son אֲדֹנֶ֤יךָ <WH113> in [the fruits] that thy master's לֶּ֙חֶם֙ <WH3899> may have food וַאֲכָל֔וֹ <WH398> to eat וּמְפִיבֹ֙שֶׁת֙ <WH4648> but Mephibosheth בֶּן־ <WH1121> son אֲדֹנֶ֔יךָ <WH113> thy master's יֹאכַ֥ל <WH398> shall eat תָּמִ֛יד <WH8548> alway לֶ֖חֶם <WH3899> bread עַל־ <WH5921> at שֻׁלְחָנִ֑י <WH7979> at my table וּלְצִיבָ֗א <WH6717> Now Ziba חֲמִשָּׁ֥ה <WH2568> fif עָשָׂ֛ר <WH6240> teen בָּנִ֖ים <WH1121> sons וְעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> and twenty עֲבָדִֽים׃ <WH5650> servants

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> Then said צִיבָא֙ <WH6717> Ziba אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> unto the king כְּכֹל֩ <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after יְצַוֶּ֜ה <WH6680> hath commanded אֲדֹנִ֤י <WH113> According to all that my lord הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> the king אֶת־ <WH853> עַבְדּ֔וֹ <WH5650> his servant כֵּ֖ן <WH3651> so יַעֲשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> do עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH5650> so shall thy servant וּמְפִיבֹ֗שֶׁת <WH4648> As for Mephibosheth אֹכֵל֙ <WH398> [said the king] he shall eat עַל־ <WH5921> and שֻׁלְחָנִ֔י <WH7979> at my table כְּאַחַ֖ד <WH259> as one מִבְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> sons הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> of the king's

וְלִמְפִיבֹ֥שֶׁת <WH4648> And Mephibosheth בֵּן־ <WH1121> son קָטָ֖ן <WH6996> had a young וּשְׁמ֣וֹ <WH8034> whose name מִיכָ֑א <WH4316> [was] Micha וְכֹל֙ <WH3605> and all מוֹשַׁ֣ב <WH4186> And all that dwelt בֵּית־ <WH1004> in the house צִיבָ֔א <WH6717> of Ziba עֲבָדִ֖ים <WH5650> [were] servants לִמְפִיבֹֽשֶׁת׃ <WH4648> unto Mephibosheth

וּמְפִיבֹ֗שֶׁת <WH4648> So Mephibosheth יֹשֵׁב֙ <WH3427> dwelt בִּיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> in Jerusalem כִּ֣י <WH3588> for עַל־ <WH5921> and שֻׁלְחַ֥ן <WH7979> table הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <WH4428> at the king's תָּמִ֖יד <WH8548> continually ה֣וּא <WH1931> he אֹכֵ֑ל <WH398> for he did eat וְה֥וּא <WH1931> now he פִּסֵּ֖חַ <WH6455> and was lame שְׁתֵּ֥י <WH8147> on both רַגְלָֽיו׃ <WH7272> his feet פ
